name: Endless Space Shooter (PixGamesStudio)
description:
Description

You play as a Triangle Space Ship. Destroy those pesky Alien Red Squares!

Controls

Aim - Mouse

Boost - Left Click

Shoot - Timer Controlled

Upcoming Features

New Enemy Types

Secondary Weapon (Right Click)

New Pick ups

Graphics Overhaul

Endless Space Shooter - v1.02 - PixGamesStudio 2022
